# Portfolio Project - Next.js 15 + TypeScript

- [x] Create project structure
- [x] Setup configuration files
- [x] Create components and pages
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Ready to run development server

## Project Details
- Framework: Next.js 15 (App Router)
- Language: TypeScript
- Styling: TailwindCSS
- Animation: Framer Motion

## Quick Start
Run `npm run dev` to start the development server.
Then edit `src/data/personal.ts` and `src/data/projects.ts` to customize your portfolio.
